Kangaskhanite.name: Kangaskhanite
Kangaskhanite.description: One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones. Have Kangaskhan hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.

Galladite.name: Galladite
Galladite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Gallade hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.

Charizardite X.description: One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones. Have Charizard hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.

Charizardite Y.name: Charizardite Y
Charizardite Y.description: One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones. Have Charizard hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.

Lopunnite.name: Lopunnite
Lopunnite.description: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Lopunny hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.

Buginium Z.name: Buginium Z
Buginium Z.description: Converts a Bug-type move into a Bug-type Z-Move. Compatible with Bug-type Pokémon.

Darkinium Z.description: Converts a Dark-type move into a Dark-type Z-Move. Compatible with Dark-type Pokémon.

Dragonium Z.name: Dragonium Z
Dragonium Z.description: Converts a Dragon-type move into a Dragon-type Z-Move. Compatible with Dragon-type Pokémon.

Electrium Z.name: Electrium Z
Electrium Z.description: Converts an Electric-type move into an Electric-type Z-Move. Compatible with Electric-type Pokémon.

Fairium Z.name: Fairium Z
Fairium Z.description: Converts a Fairy-type move into a Fairy-type Z-Move. Compatible with Fairy-type Pokémon.

Fightinium Z.description: Converts a Fighting-type move into a Fighting-type Z-Move. Compatible with Fighting-type Pokémon.

Poisonium Z.name: Poisonium Z
Poisonium Z.description: Converts a Poison-type move into a Poison-type Z-Move. Compatible with Poison-type Pokémon.

Psychium Z.name: Psychium Z
Psychium Z.description: Converts a Psychic-type move into a Psychic-type Z-Move. Compatible with Psychic-type Pokémon.

Waterium Z.name: Waterium Z
Waterium Z.description: Converts a Water-type move into a Water-type Z-Move. Compatible with Water-type Pokémon.

Aloraichium Z.name: Aloraichium Z
Aloraichium Z.description: Lets Alolan Raichu use the exclusive Z-Move 'Stoked Sparksurfer'.

Decidium Z.name: Decidium Z
Decidium Z.description: Lets Decidueye use the exclusive Z-Move 'Sinister Arrow Raid'.

Eevium Z.name: Eevium Z
Eevium Z.description: Lets Eevee use the exclusive Z-Move 'Extreme Evoboost'.

Incinium Z.name: Incinium Z

Kommonium Z.name: Kommonium Z
Kommonium Z.description: Lets Kommo-o use the exclusive Z-Move 'Clangorous Soulblaze'.

Lunalium Z.name: Lunalium Z
Lunalium Z.description: Lets Lunala use the exclusive Z-Move 'Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom'.

Lycanium Z.name: Lycanium Z

Marshadium Z.name: Marshadium Z

Mewnium Z.name: Mewnium Z

Mimikium Z.name: Mimikium Z
Mimikium Z.description: Lets Mimikyu use the exclusive Z-Move 'Let's Snuggle Forever'.

Ultranecrozium Z.name: Ultranecrozium Z
